participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Caring and family-oriented, enjoys spending time with his loved ones.
participant_1.background: My favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. I love going to the park with my three children and my wife. My wife and kids are the best. I'm a plumber.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, prefers solitude but open to conversation.
participant_2.background: I live in California but the recording artist market was dead last year. I am a recording engineer and own my own studio. What's up? I am a 46-year-old single dad. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I prefer being inside.
